trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for views that define the appearance of data in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode is derived from the ViewBase class.
You typically use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control to lay out data in columns.
You can also use the ViewBase class to create custom view modes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property defines the view mode that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control uses.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"></xref> class.
Removes all bindings and styling that are set for an item.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to remove settings from.
Gets the object that is associated with the style for the view mode.
If this property is not overridden by a derived class, the style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control is used as the default style.
Use this property to set the style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
The style to use for the view mode.
The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.

Is called when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer> first uses the properties and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern> objects that are implemented by the specified view, before using the default properties and patterns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control to use to create the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"></xref> interface that implements the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.
Gets the style to use for the items in the view mode.
Use this property to set the style for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.
The style of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> control.
Prepares an item in the view for display, by setting bindings and styles.
The item to prepare for display.
